name: symbiosis

effect.sun_moon: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

short_effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
